message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get the remaining 10%. Hopefully, we can come to an agreement.
Your offer was quite steep, Alice. Let's be more realistic. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. This accounts for the time value of money with inflation.
Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to go down to 5500, but I'm not giving up more than that.  We both need to compromise to make this work.
Alice, I appreciate the movement towards a more balanced deal. However, to be fair considering the inflation disadvantage I'm facing, I propose a 52/48 split in my favor.
